content:
# Circle Home Plus & Circle Parental Controls App

User Guide
overview: Title and introduction to the Circle Home Plus & Circle Parental Controls App User Guide.

content:
Meet Circle ®

Thanks for joining the Circle community. We're here to help families like yours find balance in today's digital world. This guide has been designed to guide you along the way in using Circle to manage content and time spent online.

If you run into questions or issues, don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to help!

- The Circle team
support.meetcircle.com
help@meetcircle.com
overview: Introduction to Circle and its purpose in helping families manage digital content and time.

content: 01 Getting familiar with Circle 4
overview: Introduction to Circle 4

content:
# Feature Description

|  |  |
| :-- | :-- |
| Pause the Internet* $*$ | Pause the Internet* with the push of a button |
|  | Unpause |
|  | Resuming Internet access after being paused |
overview: Description of the 'Pause the Internet' feature, including pausing and resuming internet access.

content: Schedule overnight offline time for each family member to make late-night scrolling a thing of the past
overview: Feature to schedule offline time for family members

content:
## Getting started

## (3) The Circle App

Install the Circle Parental Controls App
Apple iOS 12 or newer
Android 6.0 (Marshmallow) or newer
To find the app, search Circle Parental Controls in the App Store (iOS) or Google Play (Android)
overview: Instructions for installing the Circle Parental Controls App on iOS and Android devices.

content: ## Using the Circle App
overview: Section heading for using the Circle App.

content: The Menu provides quick access to additional account Settings for your Circle login and hardware, access to Legal and Help resources, and the opportunity to tell your friends and family about Circle through our Refer a Friend program.
overview: Overview of the Menu options available on the home screen.

content: From the home screen, you can find a list of all Circle devices by tapping the devices icon in the top right portion of the screen. From the profile screen, you can find a list of all assigned devices by selecting devices.
overview: Accessing the list of Circle devices from the home and profile screens.

content: Simplify how you manage your family's online screen time. Circle's features let you set limits, filter content, and keep tabs on every connected device.
overview: Overview of Circle's parental control features for managing screen time and content.

content: Set online content filters that match each family member's age and interests. When setting a filter, you first must select a filter level as a starting place, which you can always customize to be the right fit for each family member. To edit a family member's filter, tap on their profile, then select filter.
overview: Introduction to setting online content filters for family members.

content: Category descriptions are intended to describe the types of content Circle will filter.
overview: Purpose of category descriptions in Circle's filtering system.

content: Limit online time for individual apps, sites, or categories. You can set limits by day, category of content or for individual apps and sites.
overview: Overview of setting time limits for apps, sites, or categories.

content: Create a customized screen time schedule that benefits everyone in your family. Preset time offline for the important moments like practicing piano or dinner with the family.
overview: Introduction to creating a customized screen time schedule for family.

content: Find the current location for a family member's mobile devices. To use Location, the devices you want to locate must have the Circle App and VPN installed with location services enabled. Notification services must also be enabled on the parents' and kids' devices. Additionally, Location will only work once the mobile device is assigned to the kid's profile that you wish to locate.
overview: Requirements for using the Location feature to find a family member's mobile device.

content: Compare time online today, last week, or months past while viewing the total time spent online per category and platform. See a list of sites and platforms by tapping on a category. A pop-up menu will allow you to take action on a particular category that contributed total online time.
overview: Overview of how to compare and view online time across different periods and categories.

content: Circle Home Plus device
overview: Title of the section or product name

content: Circle Home Plus pairs directly with your router and inspects all the non-encrypted Internet traffic coming through your home network. You won't need to install software or adjust settings on your devices to manage them.
overview: Circle Home Plus setup and functionality with router.

content: If you don't have a Circle Home Plus, open the Circle App and press get Circle Home Plus from the home screen menu.
overview: Instructions for obtaining Circle Home Plus through the Circle App.

content: Support | support.meetcircle.com
overview: Contact information for support at MeetCircle.

content: This is a lot of 12 point text to test the ocr code and see if it works on all types of file format.
overview: Testing OCR code with 12 point text.

content: The quick brown dog jumped over the lazy fox.
overview: Repeated sentence for OCR testing.
